casebody.data:
No. —, original.

Ex parte L. H. Heymann et al. October 11, 1937. Messrs. John M. Lee and Walter E. Wiles for petitioners. Messrs. Irving H. Flamm and Myer Abrams for respondents.

Motion for leave to file petition for writ of certiorari to the Circuit Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit granted. The petition for writ of certiorari is also granted.
